task_descriptions:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: `FullName@bank`
- Your bank account: `AccountNumber@bank` at `BankName@bank`
- Today is `Day@schedule` the `Date@plane` of June, 2pm

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Apartment search
- Schedule apartment viewing
- Checking your bank balance (your PIN: `PIN@bank`)
- Weather
linear_guide: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'apartment search/viewing', 'weather', and 'bank account' (in any order), as shown on the left.
You may attempt to do some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at any time.
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics.
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want', or 'anything but ...', etc.)
Keep going until you've covered all the topics (apartment, weather, bank account). The conversation should continue at least until the last instruction is given.
Keep going :) - don't forget some smalltalk. Perhaps say something related to the first topic you talked about.
Almost there. A few more turns.
Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('hotel', 'weather', and 'flight') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close.
